message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent starting point.
I'm willing to compromise. You'll get a smaller share, but it's still a decent amount.
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need a better deal than that. Let's split it closer to 60/40.
I'm not giving up yet. I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm not going below 55%.
